channel.title: Making player walk to co-ord

item.title: Making player walk to co-ord
item.dc:creator: @ServerMuncher ServerMuncher
item.description:
@ServerMuncher wrote:

Yeah, I’ve been searching around multiple forums for hours trying to find a fix to this.

I’ve been trying to make it so that if a player clicks on a ladder, they have to be in a certain spot… If they’re not then to make them walk to that spot.

This is my attempt so far.

} else if (objectID == 11740) { if (isNextTo(2954, 3388) == true) { setAnimation(828); toX = absX; toY = absY; heightLevel = 1; break; } else { walkTo(2954, 3388); heightLevel = 1; // Ladder Down break; }

Error given:
Logs me out and then teleports me straight up without moving me.
After looking around at several forums, I’ve discovered that the walkTo method is used for NPCs.

I’ve yet to find the method for making a player walk to a co-ordinate.

If I have to code it myself, that’s fine as well. I just need to know where to start.

Read full topic
